numbered_ace_sentences: 3. Young women are more likely to reach out to their parents than young men.
4. Texting is the most common form of communication.
5. I wonder why in-person visits are the least likely form of communication.
6. Most young people live with their parents.
7. This situation has an impact on my generation.
8. My generation will go to college soon.
9. Some people do not live at home.
10. The graph shows which type of communication is most used by people who do not live at home.
12. When I do not live at home anymore, I will be most likely to interact with my parents in a certain way.
13. I ask whether young men are ghosting their parents.
